data.oai_dc:dc: Fecal crude fiber (fiber) and protein content (% dry matter) in brown bear feces collected during the mating (1) and postmating (3) season of 2010 in central Sweden. 'repro' indicates the reproductive status (AM = adult males, FWC = females with cubs-of-the-year, AF = lone adult female). Age indicates the age (years) of the each individual bear. 'fieldtime' and 'oventime' indicate the time (hours) that samples were exposed in the field and the oven, respectively. 'densiometer' indicates the canopy cover at the location where each sample was collected.
